game.description: Retrieve the legendary Sword of Light from the Dark Castle and bring it back to the Village Elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold, increased reputation with the village

tasks.description: Gather information about the Dark Castle's layout and guards.
Infiltrate the Dark Castle by disguising yourself as a guard.
Find and retrieve the Sword of Light from the throne room.
Escape the Dark Castle without being detected.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
